pages.text: The spirit sword itself does not carry any spells, need to be in close contact with the target to transfer the magic to the target, and a Magick Context can be equipped. You can craft a spirit sword by combining a magick context and a spirit sword at a workbench. A spirit sword with a magick context can be used as a crafting ingredient to extract the magick context.$(br2)Holding a soul wood sword will increase your elemental shield capacity and trigger the touch entity spell type when attacking a target, followed by the completed spell's effects.
